ing: 1 (3 ounce) package cherry-flavored gelatin mix (such as Jell-OÂ®)
des: "My family serves this Thanksgiving tradition. It's a delicious twist on plain cranberry sauce, filled with apples and walnuts. The flavor blend is excellent with turkey."
ins: Stir gelatin mix and boiling water together in a bowl until dissolved. Add pineapple juice and cranberry sauce; stir until incorporated and thickened. Fold in apple and walnuts. Pour gelatin mixture into a mold and refrigerate until set, at least 4 hours.
